CustomField.description: The ContentDocumentLink.ShareType value to use for converted files. V = view only I = inferred by user's editability of related record C = collaborator, view/edit (not supported if related to standard objects)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The ContentDocumentLink.ShareType value to use for converted files. V = view only I = inferred by user's editability of related record C = collaborator, view/edit (not supported if related to standard objects)
CustomField.label: Share Type
